amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funding for Renewable Energy, Energy Reliability, and Efficiency, Nuclear Energy, and Fossil Energy Research and Development by a total of $1,543,929,000 and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funds in the Renewable Energy, Energy Reliability, and Efficiency, Nuclear Energy, and Fossil Energy Resarcy and Devopment accounts and increase funds in the Spending Reduction Account by $1,543,929,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McClintock amendment (A014) Failed by recorded vote: 115 - 300 (Roll no. 319).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the McClintock amendment (A014) Failed by recorded vote: 115 - 300 (Roll no. 319).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A014) offered by Mr. McClintock.
